name: Mitigation Playbook for Malicious Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker exploited a vulnerability in a web application to upload a malicious PHP script that executed remotely.

action--b1c3d016-f102-4068-9d29-4b7554a7.name: Kill malicious script process
action--b1c3d016-f102-4068-9d29-4b7554a7.description: Terminate any processes associated with the malicious PHP script.

action--e08e2849-0445-4bd9-a150-b8c1b0f7.name: Review logs for suspicious activities
action--e08e2849-0445-4bd9-a150-b8c1b0f7.description: Check the access logs for any activities by the attacker.

attacker_ip.description: The IP address of the attacker, if known.

if-condition--42b482e4-2131-4f24-a4fd-ab.name: Check if attacker IP is known

action--42b482e4-2131-4f24-a4fd-aba88567.name: Block IP address of attacker
action--42b482e4-2131-4f24-a4fd-aba88567.description: Block any connection attempts from the attacker's IP address.

action--c5e3f232-e2d1-46d4-bf95-e451ff7d.name: Scan for additional vulnerabilities
action--c5e3f232-e2d1-46d4-bf95-e451ff7d.description: Run a scan to identify other vulnerabilities in the system.

while-condition--scan-loop.name: Check scan result
while-condition--scan-loop.description: Repeat scanning until the system is confirmed clean.

action--a964d2f1-3474-40b8-9d87-7265034c.name: Update firewall rules
action--a964d2f1-3474-40b8-9d87-7265034c.description: Update rules to prevent further attacks from the defined IP.
